location.zh-cn: 福建省宁德市蕉城区东侨开发区天湖东路10号闽东广电中心大厦

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省宁德市的一家市级广播电视媒体，为中共宁德市委直属的正处级事业单位。
description.en: A municipal-level radio and television media outlet in Ningde, Fujian Province, People's Republic of China, and a regular county-level public institution directly under the Ningde Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 宁德市广播电视台的前身之一，成立于1990年12月27日。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Ningde Radio and Television Station, established on December 27, 1990.

description.zh-cn: 宁德市广播电视台的前身之一，于2002年5月28日开播。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Ningde Radio and Television Station, which began broadcasting on May 28, 2002.

nodes.id: 中国共产党宁德市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁德市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在宁德市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Ningde City.

nodes.id: 中国共产党宁德市委员会宣传部

zh-cn: 中国共产党宁德市委员会宣传部

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党宁德市委员会主管意识形态方面工作的部门。
description.en: The department of the CPC Ningde Municipal Committee responsible for ideology-related work.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省宁德市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Ningde City, Fujian Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部
中华人民共和国广电部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责管理广播、电影、电视等事业。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing broadcasting, film, and television industries.

description.zh-cn: 中国福建省的省级电视台。
description.en: The provincial television station of Fujian Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 宁德市广播电视台的主要电视新闻节目。
description.en: The main television news program of Ningde Radio and Television Station.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家广播电台。
description.en: The national radio station of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中央人民广播电台制作播出的全国性新闻广播节目。
description.en: A national news radio program produced and broadcast by China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家电视台。
description.en: The national television broadcaster of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国中央电视台制作播出的全国性新闻电视节目。
description.en: A national news television program produced and broadcast by China Central Television.

description.zh-cn: 宁德电视台与宁德人民广播电台合并组建宁德市广播电视台。
description.en: Ningde Television Station and Ningde People's Radio Station merged to form Ningde Radio and Television Station.

description.zh-cn: 宁德人民广播电台与宁德电视台合并组建宁德市广播电视台。
description.en: Ningde People's Radio Station and Ningde Television Station merged to form Ningde Radio and Television Station.

relationships.target: 中国共产党宁德市委员会

description.zh-cn: 宁德市广播电视台是中共宁德市委直属的正处级事业单位。
description.en: Ningde Radio and Television Station is a regular county-level public institution directly subordinate to the CPC Ningde Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党宁德市委员会宣传部

description.zh-cn: 宁德市广播电视台由中共宁德市委宣传部直接主管。
description.en: Ningde Radio and Television Station is directly supervised by the Propaganda Department of the CPC Ningde Municipal Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党宁德市委员会宣传部
relationships.target: 中国共产党宁德市委员会

description.zh-cn: 宣传部是中国共产党宁德市委员会的下属工作部门。
description.en: The Propaganda Department is a subordinate working department of the CPC Ningde Municipal Committee.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广播电影电视部于1990年12月批准设立宁德电视台。
description.en: The Ministry of Radio, Film and Television of the People's Republic of China approved the establishment of Ningde Television Station in December 1990.

description.zh-cn: 从1991年12月起，宁德电视台的第一期节目《闽东新闻》在福建电视台一套节目插播，直至1994年12月宁德电视台开始独立播送频道。
description.en: Starting from December 1991, Ningde Television Station's first program "Mindong News" was inserted into the broadcast of Fujian Television's Channel 1, until Ningde Television Station began broadcasting its own independent channel in December 1994.

description.zh-cn: 宁德电视台于1991年12月开始播出其前身《闽东新闻》。
description.en: Ningde Television Station began broadcasting its predecessor, "Mindong News," in December 1991.

description.zh-cn: 宁德市广播电视台作为市级广播电视媒体，负责服务宁德市人民政府的政治宣传工作。
description.en: As the municipal radio and television media, Ningde Radio and Television Station is responsible for serving the political propaganda work of the Ningde Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 宁德市广播电视台的广播频率在每天晚上转播由中央人民广播电台制作的《全国新闻联播》节目。
description.en: The radio frequencies of Ningde Radio and Television Station rebroadcast the "National News Hookup" program, produced by China National Radio, every evening.

description.zh-cn: 宁德市广播电视台的电视频道在每天晚上转播由中国中央电视台制作的《新闻联播》节目。
description.en: The television channels of Ningde Radio and Television Station rebroadcast the "Xinwen Lianbo" program, produced by China Central Television, every evening.

description.zh-cn: 《全国新闻联播》是由中央人民广播电台制作和播出的新闻节目。
description.en: "National News Hookup" is a news program produced and broadcast by China National Radio.

description.zh-cn: 《新闻联播》是由中国中央电视台制作和播出的新闻节目。
description.en: "Xinwen Lianbo" is a news program produced and broadcast by China Central Television.
